Title: In My Best Interest
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Courtney Kemp Agboh, Jeff Dix, Vladimir Cvetko (executive story editor), Safia Dirie (story editor), Jeff Dix (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Knox discovers the lethal truth about the mole, Tommy runs a dangerous game against Milan, and Ghost faces a brand new threat to his family.
